name: Stapleton Skatepark
description: Staten Island's primary skatepark near the waterfront. Compact street-style layout.
history: Community-funded and built to serve Staten Island skaters who otherwise had to ferry to Brooklyn or Manhattan.
bestTimes: Weekends for the local crew. Weekdays are empty.
transitDirections: Staten Island Ferry + S51/S81 bus to Stapleton.

detailedNotes.terrain: Features include ledges, rails, quarter pipes, manual pads, flat bars. Well-maintained concrete construction.
detailedNotes.culture: Part of the Staten Island skate scene in Stapleton. Community-funded and built to serve Staten Island skaters who otherwise had to ferry to Brooklyn or Manhattan.
